function.description: Wraps a single line of text, identifying words by ' '. If wrapLongWords is true then words are split aswell. Leading spaces on a new line are stripped. Trailing spaces are not stripped.

examples.example: String.wrap(" \n Time is an illusion. Lunchtime doubly so. \n ", 10, false);
String.wrap(" Time is an illusion. Lunchtime doubly so.", 10, false);
String.wrap("Time is an illusion. Lunchtime doubly so.", 5, true);
